comments.body: Seems very reasonable to move this. I would even have been fine with everything in `daml-prim` but iirc I use `DA.Text` from `daml-stdlib`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +19,23 @@-- Note that if the call stack is reset if any function in between does not
-- have a `HasCallStack` constraint.
type HasCallStack = (?callStack : CallStack)
